name: electricity production, photovoltaic, 3kWp slanted-roof installation, single-Si, panel, mounted | electricity, low voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10002/documentation

This dataset represents the production of grid-connected low voltage electricity with a 3 kWp building integrated photovoltaic (PV) module in Canada - Prince Edward Islands in 2013. The 3 kWp module has been chosen as basic module for building integrated PV electricity production. Larger modules can easily be built with these 3 kWp modules without producing a significant error in environmental impact calculations. The module is a single-Si panel installed on a slanted roof.;An inverter is used to convert the low voltage DC power into AC power.;[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:]

From the PV module installed and ready to be used.

This activity ends with low voltage electricity produced with the 3 kWp module, assuming an average yield. 

This dataset includes tap water use for cleaning the module and itâ€™s treatment.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The annual production volume valid for 2013
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Electricity production with a grid-connected 3 kWp single-Si photovoltaic panel mounted on a building slanted roof. See field "extrapolation" for comment on the output voltage.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The simplifying assumption was made that all electricity is directly provided as low voltage electricity, so that no transformation has to take place. Even in countries with high shares of open ground installations (where medium or high voltage electricity might arrive at the busbar), the error introduced due to this assumption is not significant, as transformation processes do only have a low influence on environmental impacts.

flow.name: electricity, low voltage
flow.category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

exchanges.description: Energy loss in the system is included.
Calculated value. Lifetime*capacity*annual yield = y * kWp/unit * kWh/(kWp*y) = kWh/unit and then the reciproke.

exchanges.description: Calculated value. Amount of installation needed to produce 1 kWh * panel area per installation * water need to clean 1 m2 of panel. [unit/kWh * m2/unit * l/m2 = l/kWh]. A density of 1 kg/dm3 is assumed.
